title: France panorama. [No. 72/28]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Queen Juliana in Paris - official visit to france of the Netherlands queen. 2. In the news: The De Gaulle Memorial - inauguration of the monument to his memory. Fernandez - the Fernandez Exhibition. Public works - the International Public Works Equipment salon. 3. Aluminium - the French aluminium industry. 4. Leonor Fini - a new exhibition by the great Italian artist.
